item.text: Then he led me out to the outer court, toward the north, and brought me to the chamber that was opposite the courtyard and opposite the building on the north.

Its <st data-num="0413 06440 0753">length</st> was <st data-num="03967" class="">175</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st><n id="1" /> on the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st> <st data-num="06607" class="">side</st>,<n id="2" /> and its <st data-num="07341" class="">width</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">87½</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="05048" class="">Opposite</st> the <st data-num="06242" class="">35</st> feet<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> belonged to the <st data-num="06442" class="">inner</st> <st data-num="02691" class="">court</st>, and <st data-num="05048" class="">opposite</st> the <st data-num="07531" class="">pavement</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> belonged to the <st data-num="02435" class="">outer</st> <st data-num="02691" class="">court</st>, <st data-num="0862" class="">gallery</st> <st data-num="0413 06440">faced</st> <st data-num="0862" class="">gallery</st> in the <st data-num="07992" class="">three stories</st>.

<st data-num="06440" class="">In front of</st> the <st data-num="03957" class="">chambers</st> was a <st data-num="04109" class="">walkway</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="06442" class="">inner side</st>, <st data-num="06235" class="">17½</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07341" class="">wide</st> at a <st data-num="01870" class="">distance</st> of <st data-num="0259" class="">1¾</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st>,<n id="2" /> and their <st data-num="06607" class="">entrances</st> were on the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st>.

Now the <st data-num="05945" class="">upper</st> <st data-num="03957" class="">chambers</st> were <st data-num="07114" class="">narrower</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="0862" class="">galleries</st> <st data-num="03201" class="">took</st> more <st data-num="03201" class="">space</st><n id="1" /> from <st data-num="02007" class="">them</st> than from the <st data-num="08481" class="">lower</st> and <st data-num="08484" class="">middle</st> <st data-num="08481 08484">chambers</st> of the <st data-num="01146" class="">building</st>.

<st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> <st data-num="02007" class="">they</st> were in <st data-num="08027" class="">three stories</st> and had <st data-num="0369" class="">no</st> <st data-num="05982" class="">pillars</st> like the <st data-num="05982" class="">pillars</st> of the <st data-num="02691" class="">courts</st>; <st data-num="05921 03651">therefore</st>, the upper chambers<n id="1" /> were <st data-num="0680" class="">set back</st> from the <st data-num="0776" class="">ground</st> more than the <st data-num="08481" class="">lower</st> and <st data-num="08484" class="">middle</st> <st data-num="08481 08484">ones</st>.

As for the <st data-num="0834 02351">outer</st> <st data-num="01447" class="">wall</st> by <st data-num="05980" class="">the side of</st> the <st data-num="03957" class="">chambers</st>, <st data-num="01870" class="">toward</st> the <st data-num="02435" class="">outer</st> <st data-num="02691" class="">court</st> <st data-num="0413 06440">facing</st> the <st data-num="03957" class="">chambers</st>, it was <st data-num="02572" class="">87½</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0753" class="">long</st>.

<st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="03957" class="">chambers</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="02435" class="">outer</st> <st data-num="02691" class="">court</st> were <st data-num="02572" class="">87½</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0753" class="">long</st>, <st data-num="02009">while</st> those <st data-num="05921 06440">facing</st> the <st data-num="01964" class="">temple</st> were <st data-num="03967" class="">175</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st><n id="2" /> long.
Below these chambers was a passage on the east side as one enters from the outer court.
At the beginning of the wall of the court toward the south, facing the courtyard and the building, were chambers

like those on the north with a <st data-num="01870" class="">passage</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">in front of</st> them. The chambers that were toward the south were the same length and width as those on the north, and had matching exits and entrances and arrangements.
There was an opening at the head of the passage, the passage in front of the corresponding wall toward the east when one enters.

Then he said to me, “The north chambers and the south chambers that face the courtyard are holy chambers where the priests who approach the Lord will eat the most holy offerings. There they will place the most holy offerings—the grain offering, the sin offering, and the guilt offering, because the place is holy.

When the priests enter, then they will not go out from the sanctuary to the outer court without taking off their garments in which they minister, for these are holy; they will put on other garments, then they will go near the places where the people are.”
Now when he had finished measuring the interior of the temple, he led me out by the gate that faces east and measured all around.

He <st data-num="04058 05439">measured</st> the <st data-num="06921" class="">east</st> <st data-num="07307" class="">side</st> with the <st data-num="04060" class="">measuring</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">stick</st><n id="1" /> as <st data-num="02568 03967">875</st> feet<n id="2" /> by the <st data-num="04060" class="">measuring</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">stick</st>.

He <st data-num="04058 05439">measured</st> the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st> <st data-num="07307" class="">side</st> as <st data-num="02568 03967">875</st> feet by the <st data-num="07070" class="">measuring</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">stick</st>.

He <st data-num="04058" class="">measured</st> the <st data-num="01864" class="">south</st> <st data-num="07307" class="">side</st> as <st data-num="02568 03967">875</st> feet by the <st data-num="04060" class="">measuring</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">stick</st>.

He <st data-num="05437" class="">turned</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st> <st data-num="07307">side</st> and <st data-num="04058" class="">measured</st> <st data-num="02568 03967">875</st> feet by the <st data-num="04060" class="">measuring</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">stick</st>.
He measured it on all four sides. It had a wall around it, 875 feet long and 875 feet wide, to separate the holy and common places.
